title: Your new home awaits!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 867 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Welcome to Gateway Villas in Las Vegas, NV.', 'Offering 1 to 2 bedroom apartment options, your new home is waiting.', 'Here at this community, the leasing staff is ready to help you find the perfect place.', "You'll experience a variety of features and amenities at this community including washers and dryers and convenient on-site parking options.", 'Come see Gateway Villas today.', 'Features:', 'Central A/C, Patio with storage, Walk-in closet, Ceramic tile floors, Water, sewer, trash included, Full-size washer and dryer inside', 'Community Amenities:', 'Grill, Centrally Located, Next Door To Public Park, Assigned Covered Parking, Spa, Fitness Center, Online Rent Payments, Pool, Putting Greens', 'Pet Policy', 'We welcome your cats and dogs, up to two pets per apartment, with no weight limit.', 'Non-Refundable Pet Fee $250 and $25 a month per pet.', '*Breed restrictions apply.', 'We do not permit American Pit Bull Terrier, American Staffordshire Terrier, Staffordshire Bull Terrier, German Shepard, Doberman, Rottweiler, Akitas, and Mastiffs any mix of the previous breeds, or any other dog or breed deemed aggressive.', 'Income Requirements:', '3x the Rent', 'Want more info on this unit?', 'See the link (below):', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'zcGS40lD']
